titles.title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States regarding the right of all citizens of the United States to a public education of equal high quality.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution.

bill.summary: 2/14/2011--Introduced. Constitutional Amendment - Provides that all persons shall enjoy the right to a public education of equal high quality.
